item.description: [[Pruning]] Pruned the fig and plum [[Transplant]]ed a couple walnuts Figured out how to publish my vault on github pages!
20-10-22 | Thursday https://nfs.unl.edu/publication-type/windbreaks from the permaculture design course via verge permaculture “good enough for now safe enough to try.
